assessment_item.subject: Accountancy Volume 2
assessment_item.title: AU2GGW Q10.Which of the following are features of an efficient and effective coding system?      (1) Each item should have a unique code      (2) Each code should contain a combination of letters and numbers     (3) Each code should completely disguise the item being coded      (4) Codes should not be uniform in length and structure
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

Which of the following are features of an efficient and effective coding system?

     (1) Each item should have a unique code

     (2) Each code should contain a combination of letters and numbers

     (3) Each code should completely disguise the item being coded

     (4) Codes should not be uniform in length and structure

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

1 only

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:479"},{"text":"

1 and 2 only

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:480"},{"text":"

1, 3 and 4 only

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1288"},{"text":"

2, 3 and 4 only
